title: Here’s what’s next in the fight to curb climate change, now that talks in Brazil have ended
description: At U.N. climate talks in Belem, Brazil, experts noted mixed outcomes, with calls for action on fossil fuels and plans for future road maps.
content: At U.N. climate talks in Belem, Brazil, experts noted mixed outcomes, with calls for action on fossil fuels and plans for future road maps.
